thread.title: Katy Perry takes dig at Donald Trump and Theresa May in politically charged Brits performance
thread.title_full: Katy Perry takes dig at Donald Trump and Theresa May in politically charged Brits performance

author: Adam Boult
title: Katy Perry takes dig at Donald Trump and Theresa May in politically charged Brits performance
text:
Katy Perry takes dig at Donald Trump and Theresa May in politically charged Brits performance Katy Perry performing on stage with the Trump and May skeletons Credit: Dominic Lipinski/PA Wire Adam Boult 22 February 2017 â€¢ 9:56pm 
K aty Perry's reinvention as a politically-aware artist continued apace at the Brit Awards , as the star performed alongside two huge dancing skeletons seemingly dressed as Donald Trump and Theresa May. 
Performing current single Chained To The Rhythm, Perry took to the stage along with scores of dancers dressed as white houses (White Houses?) while the two skeletons shuffled in suitably sinister fashion. 
The point of the stage dressing might not have been entirely clear - and Perry refrained from saying anything overtly political - but the performance prompted huge excitement among viewers on social media: Did anyone else realise the skeletons on Katy Perry's Brit Awards performance is Theresa May and Donald Trump?ðŸ˜‚ #BRITs2017 pic.twitter.com/0Li55hMHV4 â€” Natalie Lewins (@LewinsNatalie) February 22, 2017 Here's your 'Katy Perry trolls Donald Trump and Theresa May as skeletons at the #brits ' gif pic.twitter.com/A3MuclCPgb â€” Graeme Demianyk (@GraemeDemianyk) February 22, 2017 Nice of Katy Perry to join in with @BuzzFeedUK 's housing crisis week by illustrating the average age of a first time buyer #BRITs2017 pic.twitter.com/14hXcxAE6R â€” Robin Edds (@robinedds) February 22, 2017 Katy perry is a savage #BRITs2017 pic.twitter.com/CSAz9ADfQ0
